title: 20 Minute Full Body Stretch Routine | Good Moves | Well+Good
description:
20 Minute Full Body Stretch Routine
No equipment needed 
Playlist: https://open.spotify.com/playlist/6fzGTPp8XxIjKKM9PMYid0?si=428gZlFISZK3VWdGtlY1IA

To get notified about new video uploads, subscribe to Well+Good's channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/Wellandgood

This full body stretch routine is the perfect way to start your day, or end a workout. Pilates instructor Floss Brolsma leads us through a 20 minute stretch that'll loosen up every tight muscle in your body. Start the playlist above, or your own tunes, and follow along! #fullbodystretch #stretching #wellandgood

Love East River Pilates? Check out their new online platform here: https://eastriverpilates.com/online

20 Minute Full Body Stretch

1. STANDING SIDE STRETCH 
2. HAMSTRING STRETCH—LEFT
3. HAMSTRING STRETCH—CENTER
4. HAMSTRING STRETCH—RIGHT
5. HAMSTRING STRETCH—CENTER
6. THORACIC FLEXION + EXTENSION
7. LOW LUNGE—LEFT
8. LOW LUNGE TWIST—LEFT
9. KNEELING POSTERIOR TILT
10. KNEELING SIDE STRETCH—LEFT
11. LOW LUNGE—RIGHT
12. LOW LUNGE TWIST—RIGHT
13. KNEELING POSTERIOR TILT
14. KNEELING SIDE STRETCH—RIGHT
15. CAT-COW
16. CHILD’S POSE TO COBRA
17. COBRA THORACIC EXTENSION
18. TABLE TOP SIDE OPENER—RIGHT
19. TABLE TOP SIDE OPENER—LEFT
20. CHILD’S POSE
21. FIGURE FOUR BRIDGE—LEFT
22. FIGURE FOUR—LEFT
23. FIGURE FOUR BRIDGE—RIGHT
24. FIGURE FOUR—RIGHT
25. ROLLING BRIDGE
26. FULL BODY TWIST—RIGHT
27. FULL BODY TWIST—LEFT
28. CHEST OPENER—RIGHT
29. SITTING SIDE STRETCH
30. CHEST OPENER—LEFT

Subscribe to Well+Good’s channel for more fitness videos: https://www.youtube.com/c/Wellandgood

comments: 20+ years teaching Yoga, now with an arthritic hip (played a ton of tennis late in life) and frozen shoulder and still I am able to do this routine daily. Thank you so much!
Hello Floss!  I discovered this channel just today!  Just did this stretch!  It was just what I needed!  Whole body feels so much better! Will do more!  Thank you so much!  Have a wonderful day!
Been really sick lately and felt so good to have this incorporated to my morning for some movement 💛
Floss is an ANGEL. Thank you!!!

I'm doing this everyday for a month (on  day 3). Hoping it'll help with  peripheral neuropathy.  Great vid, thanks!Also LOVE THERE IS NO BACKGROUND MUSIC, as I'd  rather  focus on the routine and my body on the day. Besides the OPTION being there is GREAT!. I'm a musician, but I music as motivation....
